lyric:
[00:00.000] 作曲 : Bruno Mars/Philip Lawrence/Ari Levine/Phredley Brown
[00:01.000] 作词 : Bruno Mars/Philip Lawrence/Ari Levine/Phredley Brown
[00:04.920]Give me all, give me all, give me all your attention baby
[00:08.860]I got to tell you a little something about yourself
[00:12.850]You're wonderful, flawless, ooh you're a sexy lady
[00:17.040]But you walk around here like you wanna be someone else
[00:23.220]I know that you dont know it, but you're fine, so fine
[00:31.370]Oh girl im gonna show you when you're mine, oh mine
[00:37.390]Treasure, that means what you are
[00:43.460]Honey you're my golden star
[00:47.780]I know you can make my wish come true
[00:51.880]If you let me treasure you
[00:56.170]If you let me treasure you
[01:02.910]Pretty girl, pretty girl, pretty girl you should be smiling
[01:06.840]A girl like you should never live so blue
[01:10.890]You're everything I see in my dreams
[01:15.540]I would say that to you if it wasnt true
[01:21.480]I know that you dont know it, but you're fine, so fine
[01:29.720]Oh girl im gonna show you when you're mine, oh mine
[01:36.100]Treasure, that means what you are
[01:41.880]Honey you're my golden star
[01:46.160]I know you can make my wish come true
[01:50.210]If you let me treasure you
[01:54.440]If you let me treasure you
[02:01.350]You are my treasure, you are my treasure
[02:06.250]You are my treasure, yeah, you you you, you are
[02:10.230]You are my treasure, you are my treasure
[02:14.560]You are my treasure, yeah, you you you, you are
[02:18.880]Treasure, that means what you are
[02:24.410]Honey you're my golden star
[02:28.550]I know you can make my wish come true
[02:32.600]If you let me treasure you
[02:36.880]If you let me treasure you
tlyric:
[by:阿朱本尊]
[00:04.920]看过来,小宝贝，把你所有注意力放我身上
[00:08.860]让我说点事吧
[00:12.850]你真是完美的，无暇的小骚货
[00:17.040]但你好像感觉不到我的存在
[00:23.220]我知道你一直不清楚，没关系
[00:31.370]因为我马上就向所有人证明，你就是我的
[00:37.390]宝贝，你这小宝贝
[00:43.460]你是我天空中最亮的星
[00:47.780]美梦成真的小星星
[00:51.880]让我永远珍惜你
[00:56.170]珍惜你让我到永远
[01:02.910]小美女，小宝贝，朝我笑一笑
[01:06.840]像你这么耀眼的女孩怎能如此忧伤
[01:10.890]我连梦里都只有你
[01:15.540]不管是不是我都会这么告诉你
[01:21.480]我知道你一直不清楚，没关系
[01:29.720]因为我马上就向所有人证明，你就是我的
[01:36.100]宝贝，你这小宝贝
[01:41.880]你是我天空中最亮的星
[01:46.160]美梦成真的小星星
[01:50.210]让我永远珍惜你
[01:54.440]珍惜你让我到永远
[02:01.350]你是我的宝贝，我靓丽的宝贝
[02:06.250]你是我的宝贝，耶，宝贝没错就是你
[02:10.230]你是我的宝贝，我闪耀的宝贝
[02:14.560]你是我的宝贝，耶，宝贝没错就是你
[02:18.880]宝贝，你这小宝贝
[02:24.410]你是我天空中最亮的星
[02:28.550]美梦成真的小星星
[02:32.600]让我永远珍惜你
[02:36.880]珍惜你让我到永远
